3697714280172729854892978562666656243599.question: Bitcoin Up or Down - January 1, 11AM ET

raw_market.question: Bitcoin Up or Down - January 1, 11AM ET
raw_market.description:
This market will resolve to "Up" if the close price is greater than or equal to the open price for the BTC/USDT 1 hour candle that begins on the time and date specified in the title. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "Down".

The resolution source for this market is information from Binance, specifically the BTC/USDT pair (https://www.binance.com/en/trade/BTC_USDT). The close « C » and open « O » displayed at the top of the graph for the relevant "1H" candle will be used once the data for that candle is finalized.

Please note that this market is about the price according to Binance BTC/USDT, not according to other sources or spot markets.

5533146607418369283467771767601078882897.question: Bitcoin Up or Down on January 1?

raw_market.question: Bitcoin Up or Down on January 1?
raw_market.description:
This market will resolve to "Up" if the "Close" price for the Binance 1 minute candle for BTC/USDT Dec 31 '25 12:00 in the ET timezone (noon) is lower than the final "Close" price for the Jan 1 '26 12:00 ET candle.

This market will resolve to "Down" if the "Close" price for the Binance 1 minute candle for BTC/USDT Dec 31 '25 12:00 in the ET timezone (noon) is higher than the final "Close" price for the Jan 1 '26 12:00 ET candle.

If the final "Close" price for both of these candles is exactly equal on Binance, this market will resolve 50-50.

The resolution source for this market is Binance, specifically the BTC/USDT "Close" prices currently available at https://www.binance.com/en/trade/BTC_USDT with "1m" and "Candles" selected on the top bar.

Please note that this market is about the price according to Binance BTC/USDT, not according to other sources or spot markets.

The resolution source for this market is information from Binance, specifically the XRP/USDT pair (https://www.binance.com/en/trade/XRP_USDT). The close « C » and open « O » displayed at the top of the graph for the relevant "1H" candle will be used once the data for that candle is finalized.

Please note that this market is about the price according to Binance XRP/USDT, not according to other sources or spot markets.

7321281646330116310005299429495813420151.question: XRP Up or Down on January 1?

raw_market.question: XRP Up or Down on January 1?
raw_market.description:
This market will resolve to "Up" if the "Close" price for the Binance 1 minute candle for XRP/USDT Dec 31 '25 12:00 in the ET timezone (noon) is lower than the final "Close" price for the Jan 1 '26 12:00 ET candle.

This market will resolve to "Down" if the "Close" price for the Binance 1 minute candle for XRP/USDT Dec 31 '25 12:00 in the ET timezone (noon) is higher than the final "Close" price for the Jan 1 '26 12:00 ET candle.

If the final "Close" price for both of these candles is exactly equal on Binance, this market will resolve 50-50.

The resolution source for this market is Binance, specifically the XRP/USDT "Close" prices currently available at https://www.binance.com/en/trade/XRP_USDT with "1m" and "Candles" selected on the top bar.

Please note that this market is about the price according to Binance XRP/USDT, not according to other sources or spot markets.

The resolution source for this market is information from Chainlink, specifically the XRP/USD data stream available at https://data.chain.link/streams/xrp-usd.
Please note that this market is about the price according to Chainlink data stream XRP/USD, not according to other sources or spot markets.
